description: Update public key information. Note that the only value you can change is the comment.

parameters.name: PublicKeyConfig
parameters.description: A public key configuration. A string included in the request to help make sure that the request can't be replayed. A name to help identify the public key. The public key that you can use with signed URLs and signed cookies, or with field-level encryption. Comment (string) --- A comment to describe the public key. The comment cannot be longer than 128 characters.

nested_params.name: CallerReference
nested_params.description: A string included in the request to help make sure that the request can't be replayed.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: A name to help identify the public key.

nested_params.name: EncodedKey
nested_params.description: The public key that you can use with signed URLs and signed cookies, or with field-level encryption.

nested_params.name: Comment
nested_params.description: A comment to describe the public key. The comment cannot be longer than 128 characters.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the public key that you are updating.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the public key.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the public key was uploaded.

nested_items.name: PublicKeyConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration information about a public key that you can use with signed URLs and signed cookies, or with field-level encryption.

nested_items.name: CallerReference
nested_items.description: A string included in the request to help make sure that the request can't be replayed.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A name to help identify the public key.

nested_items.name: EncodedKey
nested_items.description: The public key that you can use with signed URLs and signed cookies, or with field-level encryption.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: A comment to describe the public key. The comment cannot be longer than 128 characters.

nested_items.name: ETag
nested_items.description: The identifier of the current version of the public key.
